headline: Prudential Financial (PRU): Taking Stock of Valuation After Recent Pullback and 3-Year Outperformance
summary: Prudential Financial (PRU) has quietly outperformed many insurers over the past 3 years, supported by steady revenue and earnings growth, even as the stock has slipped slightly this year after a strong performance over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Prudential Financial. At around $114.99 per share, Prudential’s recent pullback this week comes after a robust 30 day share price return and stronger 3 year total shareholder return. This hints that longer term momentum is still...

headline: Is Prudential Financial Attractively Priced After Recent Share Price Rebound in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Prudential Financial at around $114.99 is a bargain or already priced for perfection? You are not alone. This stock often attracts value minded investors trying to decide if now is the moment to step in or top up. Despite a modest 2.0% gain over the last year, the stock has climbed 7.7% in the past month even after a 2.2% dip this week, and it remains up 34.1% over three years and 90.3% over five years. This suggests the market has steadily warmed to its story while still...
